Hi,

Charts are using (0,0) as their default origin. But, I would like to use an another minimum value for the y-axis.

I saw that this issue was reported by an user of the 1.7.8 version, here : https://phpexcel.codeplex.com/workitem/19004

I just downloaded the latest 1.8 version to check if this problem fixed, but I didn't find anything in the changelog or in the documentation .

Is there by any achance a workaround to get this problem fixed with the latest version of PHPExcel ?

And many thanks to PHPExcel developers for their excellent job !
